chapters.title: Chapter 5:  The Forging of a Hammer
chapters.info:
Seonid Traighan,
      p. 183 (210)â€”Aes
      Sedai of the Green Ajah.  She grew up in Cairhien.  She was part of
      Salidar's embassy to Rand.  She now travels with
      Perrin and company.  She has two Warders.
      See also

      Wynter, Teryl.
